author: Kevin James
text: There’s no better feeling in the world than a warm pizza box in your lap.

author: Unknown
text: You can't make everyone happy. You're not pizza.

author: Dora J. Arod
text: My love is pizza shaped. Won’t you have a slice? It’s circular, so there’s enough to go around.

author: Unknown
text: Pizza is not a 'trend' it's a way of life.

author: Bill Murray
text: Unless you are a pizza, the answer is yes, I can live without you.

author: Unknown
text: I want someone to look at me the same way I look at pizza.

author: Madeline Oles
text: Pizza is like the entire food pyramid!

author: Bill Murray
text: Every pizza is a personal pizza if you try hard and believe in yourself.

author: Unknown
text: Do good. Be nice. Order pizza. Repeat.

author: Unknown
text: You can't buy happiness. But you can buy pizza, and that's kind of the same thing.

author: Mike Birbiglia
text: I love pizza. I want to marry it but it would just be to eat her family at the wedding.

author: Gwen Stefani
text: You know what? Part of me just wants to eat pizza and go to sleep.

author: Unknown
text: Keep your friends close and your pizza closer.

author: Andrew W.K.
text: Anyone who says that money cannot buy happiness has clearly never spent their money on pizza.

author: Unknown
text: Life is not about finding yourself. It's about finding pizza.

author: Amy Neftzger
text: Those pizzas I ate were for medicinal purposes.

author: Unknown
text: I can't turn water into wine, but I can turn pizza into breakfast.

author: Jet Paacal
text: A pizza slice a day keeps sadness away.

author: Unknown
text: Beauty comes in all shapes and sizes. Small, large, circle, square, thin crust, thick crust, stuffed crust, extra toppings.

author: Sarah Burgess
text: I’d rather have leftover pizza than leftover feelings.

author: Unknown
text: No matter what happens, pizza will always be there for you, thick and thin, in the crust we trust.

author: Aubrey Plaza
text: Time is money, money is power, power is pizza, and pizza is knowledge, let’s go!

author: Unknown
text: Keep calm and order pizza.

author: Jason Barnett
text: I want to live in a world where the need for pizza belittles that of war.

author: Jandy Nelson
text: I love pizza, meaning: even when I’m in the middle of eating pizza, I wish I were eating pizza.

author: Tiger Woods
text: And I don’t cook, either. Not as long as they still deliver pizza.

author: Henry Rollins
text: Pizza makes me think anything is possible.

author: G.A. McKevett
text: There’s very little in my world that a foot massage and a thin-crust, everything-on-it pizza won’t set right.

author: Yogi Berra
text: You better cut the pizza in four pieces because I’m not hungry enough to eat six.

author: Scott Gimple
text: You can do irrefutably impossible things with the right amount of planning and support from intelligent and hardworking people and pizza.

author: America Ferrera
text: I just want to be in my sweats, walk my dog, watch tv and eat pizza.

author: Charles Pierce
text: The perfect lover is one who turns into a pizza at 4:00 a.m.

author: Oliver Markus Malloy
text: Sex is like pizza: if you’re going to use bbq sauce, you better know what the fuck you’re doing.

author: Jason Barnett
text: I want to live in a world where the need for pizza belittles that of war.

author: Jayden Hunter
text: Heaven would be a comfortable chair, a library, diet coke, and an occasional cheese pizza. Sex once in a while. No talking.

author: Daria
text: There is no moment in life that can’t be improved with pizza.

author: Unknown
text: A pizza’s worth a thousand words.

author: Pizza Hut
text: Gather ’round the good stuff!

author: Tess Holliday
text: If you want to eat pizza, have the pizza.

author: Lara Stone
text: I think of dieting, then I eat pizza.

author: Jennifer Lawrence
text: I want pizza with my face on it.
